title: 1000th win
body:
I'm currently on 999 Normal wins and was wondering if it was possible to play with a Riot member for my 1000th win.
What better time than Oceans week to get that 1000th win.

replies.body:
Hey there!

I'll accept the honour of playing for your 1000th win. Is there a particular day or mode you'd like to play? Let me know and I'll shoot you an invite when I can. :)
Update: Any day other than Thursday, have had some plans changed around. Whatever day and time is best for you, I'm flexible

Preferably after Thursday, time doesn't really matter whenever is best for you. Preferably normals but i'm always down for some ARAM fun :)
Thank you for the opportunity :)
Gonna bump this for you man. GL getting that game. :^)
Yo riot dont leave this lad hanging.
it's been 2 days, he is hanging.

Thanks :)
Pretty patient overall, didn't expect a reply so quick tbh. Was happy to wait either way.
